Document:
# Kebab [color=#fcdf03]Each and every kind of kebab requires a skewer![/color] Don't worry, you'll get them back! [color=#888084]Hopefully.[/color] Just place them in the microwave with everything else.
[color=#a4885c]Meat Kebab[/color]
- 3 meat cutlets
[color=#a4885c]Hawaiian Kebab[/color]
- Chili pepper - Meat cutlet - Slice of pineapple
[color=#a4885c]Fiesta Kebab[/color]
- Chili pepper - Ear of corn
- Meat cutlet - Tomato
[color=#a4885c]Rat Kebab[/color]
- Rat (or two)
[color=#a4885c]Human Kebab[/color]
- Human torso
